name: Lamp
description: A charming lamp that's been lighting up my reading nook. It casts a soft, inviting glow, perfect for those who love to curl up with a good book. It's seen some of my favorite chapters and is ready to illuminate yours!

name: Board Game Set
description: A family board game set that’s brought joy to many game nights. All pieces are intact and ready for new players!

name: Coffee Maker
description: A compact coffee maker perfect for small kitchens. Never used, still in original packaging.

name: Desk Chair
description: Comfortable ergonomic chair with adjustable height and tilt. Minor wear on the armrests but still in great shape.

name: Guitar
description: A beautiful acoustic guitar that’s helped me learn so many songs. Ready for someone new to strum and create.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Brand new yoga mat. Non-slip surface, eco-friendly material, and easy to clean.

name: Cookware Set
description: High-quality non-stick cookware set. Perfect for anyone moving into a new home or upgrading their kitchen.

name: Baby Stroller
description: Gently used stroller, clean and in great condition. Easy to fold and lightweight for travel.

name: Bookshelf
description: Sturdy 5-shelf wooden bookshelf. Some scratches but otherwise solid and reliable.

name: Tablet
description: 8-inch Android tablet in excellent condition. Includes charger and protective case.

name: Winter Coat
description: Warm and stylish winter coat. Never worn, still with tags attached.

name: Tent
description: 2-person camping tent used for a few trips. Easy setup and waterproof.

name: Bicycle
description: Hybrid city bike in good condition. Recently tuned up and ready to ride.

name: Vacuum Cleaner
description: Brand new cordless vacuum cleaner. Powerful suction, lightweight, and rechargeable.

name: Sofa
description: Comfy 3-seater sofa with removable covers. Some minor fabric fading but very comfortable.

name: Microwave Oven
description: Compact microwave oven in good condition. All functions work perfectly.
